data.trans: Hỏi xung quanh, thăm dò, dò hỏi
data.trans_hint: Tôi không biết có vị trí trống nào nhưng tôi sẽ thăm dò thử xem.
data.en_hint: I don't know of any empty position but I'll ask around.
data.content_game_1: I don't know of any empty position but I'll ask around.
data.answer_en_hint: I don't know of any empty position but I'll ask around.

data.trans: Đẩy việc gì lên sớm hơn dự định
data.trans_hint: Bạn sẽ muốn đẩy cuộc họp lúc 4 giờ chiều hôm nay lên sớm hơn để có thể đến sân bay đúng giờ.
data.en_hint: You will want to bring forward your 4 p.m meeting today in order to make it to the airport on time.
data.content_game_1: You will want to bring forward your 4 p.m meeting today in order to make it to the airport on time.
data.answer_en_hint: You will want to bring forward your 4 p.m meeting today in order to make it to the airport on time.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đang ở gần đấy, vì vậy tôi quyết định ghé thăm cô ấy nhưng cô ấy không có ở nhà.
data.en_hint: I was in the neighborhood, so I decided to call in on her, but she was not home.
data.content_game_1: I was in the neighborhood, so I decided to call in on her, but she was not home.
data.answer_en_hint: I was in the neighborhood, so I decided to call in on her, but she was not home.

data.trans: Hủy bỏ kế hoạch, dự án
data.trans_hint: Vì đại dịch Covid, tôi phải hủy bỏ nhiều chuyến công tác lại.
data.en_hint: Due to the Covid pandemic, I had to call off many business trips.
data.content_game_1: Due to the Covid pandemic, I had to call off many business trips.
data.answer_en_hint: Due to the Covid pandemic, I had to call off many business trips.

data.trans_hint: Hãy hoàn thiện bản đề xuất vào cuối ngày hôm nay nào.
data.en_hint: Let's firm up the proposal by the end of today.
data.content_game_1: Let's firm up the proposal by the end of today.
data.answer_en_hint: Let's firm up the proposal by the end of today.

data.trans_hint: Trong khi bạn đang ở trong thành phố, tại sao ta không sắp xếp chút thời gian để gặp nhau nhỉ?
data.en_hint: While you are in town, why don't we fix up a time to see each other?
data.content_game_1: While you are in town, why don't we fix up a time to see each other?
data.answer_en_hint: While you are in town, why don't we fix up a time to see each other?

data.trans_hint: Tôi bị nhầm ngày và đã nhỡ mất một cuộc họp rất quan trọng.
data.en_hint: I got the dates mixed up and missed a very important meeting.
data.content_game_1: I got the dates mixed up and missed a very important meeting.
data.answer_en_hint: I got the dates mixed up and missed a very important meeting.

data.trans_hint: Nếu bạn có bất kỳ câu hỏi nào, đừng ngần ngại gì mà hãy cho tôi biết nhé.
data.en_hint: Should you have any questions, please don't hesitate to let me know.
data.content_game_1: Should you have any questions, please don't hesitate to let me know.
data.answer_en_hint: Should you have any questions, please don't hesitate to let me know.

data.trans: Thân mến (Viết ở cuối bức thư)
data.trans_hint: Hẹn gặp lại bạn sớm. Thân mến, Katrina.
data.en_hint: See you soon. Lots of love from Katrina.
data.content_game_1: See you soon. Lots of love from Katrina.
data.answer_en_hint: See you soon. Lots of love from Katrina.

data.trans: Dời cái gì lại (để làm sau)
data.trans_hint: Tôi sẽ dời lại tất cả cuộc họp của tôi ngày hôm nay vì thế chúng ta có thể kết thúc bản đề xuất này.
data.en_hint: I will put back all of my meetings today until later so that we can finish this proposal.
data.content_game_1: I will put back all of my meetings today until later so that we can finish this proposal.
data.answer_en_hint: I will put back all of my meetings today until later so that we can finish this proposal.

data.trans_hint: Bạn nên ra sân bay sớm nếu không muốn gặp rủi ro lỡ chuyến bay.
data.en_hint: You should leave early for the airport if you don't want to take the risk of missing the flight.
data.content_game_1: You should leave early for the airport if you don't want to take the risk of missing the flight.
data.answer_en_hint: You should leave early for the airport if you don't want to take the risk of missing the flight.
